name: Bay 11
description: Bay 11, bred by Grand Daddy Purp, is a potent sativa strain with unspecified genetics. Its dense, pale buds are coated in amber resin with a sweet, fruity aroma that initiates immediate relaxation. A favorite strain for patients needing daytime relief, Bay 11 eases pain while boosting appetite. Bay 11 has a 67 day flowering period indoors, and outdoor gardens will be ready for harvest near the end of October.
descriptionPlain: Bay 11, bred by Grand Daddy Purp, is a potent sativa strain with unspecified genetics. Its dense, pale buds are coated in amber resin with a sweet, fruity aroma that initiates immediate relaxation. A favorite strain for patients needing daytime relief, Bay 11 eases pain while boosting appetite. Bay 11 has a 67 day flowering period indoors, and outdoor gardens will be ready for harvest near the end of October.
aka: Bay11, Bay-11, Grandaddy Bay 11, Grandaddy Bay11, Grandaddy Bay-11, Grand Daddy Bay 11, Grand Daddy Bay11, Grand Daddy Bay-11

highlightedReviews.text: Great smoke. Buds smell very sweet, almost like sugar cookies. Beautiful fluffy nugs. Euphoric, yet clear high. Great smoke for any time of day.

Smells fuckin amazing 

7/10 jumps 
8/10 chill 

Munchies are not too bad

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Abusive OG, Harmony, Master Skunk, Bay 11, and Shangri La OG
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
It’s Friday, and you know what that means: new strains have been added to the Leafly database! Our new indica, Abusive OG, is a close relative of OG Kush and is most commonly found in California. Harmony and Master Skunk make up our new hybrid strains, with familiar genetics that will have you madly chasing these down. Shangri La OG is an exclusive strain available only to Canadian patients, but worry not, sativa-lovers: Bay 11 is a more accessible variety bred by none other than the legendary Grand Daddy Purp.
Keep an eye out for these newcomers over the weekend, and as always, leave a review if you’ve already tried one!
 1. Abusive OG
Characteristics of Abusive OG:

Indica strain
Breeder: Abusive
Californian cut of OG Kush
Earthy spice and lemon aroma
Relaxes the mind and body
Patients choose this strain to remedy pain, anxiety, appetite loss, and sleeplessness

2. Harmony
Characteristics of Harmony:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Santa Marta Colombian Gold, OG Kush, and Lemon Thai
Flowery, lemon aroma
Invigorating and uplifting effects
Flowers in 8 to 9 weeks

3. Master Skunk
Characteristics of Master Skunk:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Master Kush and Skunk #1
Breeder: Mr. Nice Seeds
Sweet and earthy aroma
Most commonly used to treat sharp or chronic pain
Flowers in 6 weeks

4. Bay 11
Characteristics of Bay 11:

Sativa strain
Breeder: Grand Daddy Purp
Sweet, fruity aroma
Initiates immediate relaxation
Eases pain while boosting appetite
Flowers in 67 days

5. Shangri La OG
Characteristics of Shangri La OG:

80% sativa
Cross between Kali Mist and Amnesia
Cultivated by Tilray in Canada
Sweet jasmine aroma
May help patients with glaucoma, pain, inflammation, and appetite loss
